content: this is a quick project worked in one color with a textured body meant for a slight slouch this pattern has an easy repetition perfect for beginners i wrote this pattern for an adult size but as the pattern is pretty easy it can be adjusted for smaller or larger sizes materials needed are 5 00- 6 00 mm 16 circular needles 6 00 mm dpns stitch marker and a tapestry needle one skein of caron x pantone 6 00mm yarn is my recommendation as this yarn has a nice stretch and texture
